ygData.subject: Re: Why do YOU want to be a cleric?
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually there is about the same amount of down time if I m the only healer.    And the EXP is about the same..... If I am in a party and use all my mana
ygData.messageBody:
Actually there is about the same amount of down time if I'm the only
healer. And the EXP is about the same.....

If I am in a party and use all my mana healing my group I'll still sit and
med till almost full mana before my party pulls. Dont get me wrong, I
would much rather play in a group than solo, I just wanted to point out
to people that CLERICS can solo, you just have to know what you are doing.

Mr. J Daniels


On Thu, 3 Jun 1999 EqDungin@... wrote:

> From: EqDungin@...
>
> What level are you? because I am level 19 , and I could solo a yellow Dry
> bone in unrest if every piece fell together right, but certainly not
> reliably. i guess just make sure you do it near a zone, plus there is a lot
> of down time between fights, sooo much better in a group , its how this game
> is built
>
>
> Dungin Level 19th cler rathe
